page.title: 14Jays the Butchers
page.content: Mr Jays has been the butcher in Lower Beeding for 14 years and he employs 2 assistants. The shop was built 95 years ago and there have been 3 butchers there. The shop is open 6 days a week and sells vegetables and general grocery items as well as meat. Beefburgers and special sausages - pork and garlic, pork and apricot and pork and leek - are made on the premises. Customers are drawn from a very wide area because of the fame of the products. Meat is also taken abroad by people who work for airlines - bacon to Africa and steak to Saudi Arabia. One man spends Â£500 a time on steak for Arabia. Once a Lower Beeding boy was climbing in the Himalayas when he met a Mr.Ogg (who is attached to the British Embassy in Kuala Lumpur). "Oh, Lower Beeding - I get my sausages from there,sent out by diplomatic bag.
